医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新的工作流程可以显着减少紧急姑息放射治疗的等待时间一项新的研究表明，使用以前进行的诊断性计算机断层扫描 (CT) 扫描代替 CT 模拟扫描来计划简单的姑息性放射治疗可以大大减少人们等待紧急治疗的时间，从而改善患者的体验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/New-workflow-could-significantly-reduce-wait-time-for-urgent-palliative-radiation-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/New-workflow-could-significantly-reduce-wait-time-for-urgent-palliative-radiation-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c73b521-568b-4f6d-97c4-39f7531547e7 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 20:57:45 -0400 New workflow could significantly reduce wait time for urgent palliative radiation therapy
维生素 D 和遗传学如何塑造早期大脑发育该研究调查了孕妇及其 3-5 岁孩子的维生素 D 水平和维生素 D 结合蛋白基因型如何影响儿童早期神经发育。研究结果表明，儿童维生素 D 浓度较高与较好的神经发育评分相关，此外还有社会人口因素和某些遗传变异的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/How-vitamin-D-and-genics-shape-early-brain-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/How-vitamin-D-and-genics-shape-early-brain-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d227f53b-c737-4746-9d6f-e432d4e4fa36 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 20:54:00 -0400 How vitamin D and genetics shape early brain development
口服脂质纳米颗粒药物有望预防小鼠结肠炎相关癌症佐治亚州立大学生物医学科学研究所的研究人员领导的一项研究表明，一种口服脂质纳米颗粒药物可以预防小鼠肿瘤的发展，这表明这是一种有前途的预防结肠炎相关癌症的药物制剂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Oral-lipid-nanoarticle-drug-shows-promise-for-preventing-colitis-linked-cancer-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Oral-lipid-nanoarticle-drug-shows-promise-for-preventing-colitis-linked-cancer-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34e09776-4200-4b41-9d18-2e9266796e7e Wed, 04 Oct 2023 20:52:18 -0400 Oral lipid nanoparticle drug shows promise for preventing colitis-associated cancer in mice
代谢健康肥胖背后的脂肪组织功能障碍今年欧洲糖尿病研究协会年会的一次会议将探讨代谢健康肥胖 (MHO) 概念的最新数据——公众更常称之为“肥胖但健康”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/The-adipose-tissue-dysfunction-behind-metabolically-healthy-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/The-adipose-tissue-dysfunction-behind-metabolically-healthy-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=012698c8-a404-44af-8740-977e22440778 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 20:40:05 -0400 The adipose tissue dysfunction behind metabolically healthy obesity
饮食深入探究：揭示血压战场中的好、坏和不明之处《营养进展》中的一篇综述批判性地分析了各种饮食元素对血压和高血压的影响，揭示了不同食物组和营养素的一系列影响。虽然某些饮食和食物（如 DASH、生酮和亚麻籽）在控制血压方面显示出希望，但证据差异很大，敦促进一步研究以完善现有的高血压饮食指南。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Dietary-deep-dive-Unveiling-the-good-the-bad-and-the-unclear-in-blood-Pressure-battleground.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Dietary-deep-dive-Unveiling-the-good-the-bad-and-the-unclear-in-blood-Pressure-battleground.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4998be98-cc83-4dc4-8ad6-2589f56744f1 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 20:24:00 -0400 Dietary deep dive: Unveiling the good, the bad, and the unclear in blood pressure battleground
早期二甲双胍治疗在抑制妊娠糖尿病问题方面效果不佳在一项重要的随机临床试验中，测试了早期二甲双胍治疗是否有可能减少妊娠期糖尿病孕妇的胰岛素依赖和增强血糖控制；然而，它并没有改善糖尿病症状。虽然二甲双胍可减少母亲体重增加，但其对原发性糖尿病症状和婴儿体重增加等其他次要结果的影响是复杂的，表明需要进一步集中研究来阐明这些关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Early-metformin-therapy-falls-short-in-curbing-gestational-diabetes-woes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Early-metformin-therapy-falls-short-in-curbing-gestational-diabetes-woes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7e96498a-8ce5-4d18-aeea-5067a5f5074c Wed, 04 Oct 2023 19:56:00 -0400 Early metformin therapy falls short in curbing gestational diabetes woes
社交媒体正在让我们的青少年脱轨吗？研究揭示了青少年健康的平衡行为研究深入探讨了社交媒体对青少年的不同影响，区分了健康、不健康和依赖的使用方式，同时强调了影响青少年健康的一系列个人、人际和背景因素。它表明，平衡的社交媒体方法，加上积极的现实世界互动和替代休闲活动，可以减轻对青少年心理健康和整体福祉的负面影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Is-social-media-derailing-our-teens-Study-unveils-the-balancing-act-for-adolescent-wellbeing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Is-social-media-derailing-our-teens-Study-unveils-the-balancing-act-for-adolescent-wellbeing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4fe6992e-860f-4646-ae02-88124fe09a05 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 19:18:00 -0400 Is social media derailing our teens? Study unveils the balancing act for adolescent wellbeing
数据科学在健康研究中的应用造福非洲人口研究人员讨论了数据科学对于健康研究的重要性，这将使非洲人口受益匪浅。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Application-of-data-science-in-health-research-to-benefit-the-African-population.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Application-of-data-science-in-health-research-to-benefit-the-African-population.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f42243f1-4ea5-4943-a302-7f177ac19799 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 15:41:00 -0400 Application of data science in health research to benefit the African population
乳酸菌治疗炎症性肠病的功效乳酸菌在治疗炎症性肠病中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Effectiveness-of-Lactobacillus-in-treating-itis-bowel-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Effectiveness-of-Lactobacillus-in-treating-lingual-bowel-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c0ff794-fc89-42d0-ba3b-db965b850a06 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 15:34:00 -0400 Effectiveness of Lactobacillus in treating inflammatory bowel disease
Aventa Genomics 宣布推出 Aventa FusionPlus，这是首个针对实体癌症患者的 3D 基因组学临床测试Aventa™ Genomics, LLC 是一家由 Arima Genomics, Inc. 和 Protean BioDiagnostics Inc. 合资成立的临床实验室，今天宣布推出 Aventa FusionPlus，这是一种用于检测基因融合的下一代测序 (NGS) 测试，福尔马林固定石蜡包埋 (FFPE) 肿瘤组织中 361 个基因的易位和重排。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Aventa-Genomics-Announces-Launch-of-Aventa-FusionPlus-the-First-3D-Genomics-Clinical-Test-for-Patients-with-Solid-癌症.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Aventa-Genomics-Announces-Launch-of-Aventa-FusionPlus-the-First-3D-Genomics-Clinical-Test-for-Patients-with-Solid- Cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=70326f12-6ff3-4565-a39b-edc5940140d4 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 11:49:00 -0400
